mapper.select: SELECT SUB_SEQ , SUB_CATEGORY, MAJOR_NUMBER , SUB_GRADE,SUB_SEMESTER ,SUB_NAME , PROFESSOR_ID ,PROFESSOR_NAME , SUB_INFO , SUB_ROOM,SUB_WEEK,SUB_S_CLASS , SUB_E_CLASS,SUB_MAX_STUDENT , SUB_NOW_STUDENT ,SUB_POINT ,SUB_REF , SUB_PARENT FROM SUBJECT WHERE PROFESSOR_ID=#{user_id} AND SUB_PARENT = 0
